body: Can't wait till this gets translated. Thanks @DarklionDP for the break down
thanks to the brother below I understood it well

The story has 4 arcs:
-The First Arc placed after the finale, she is happily having sex with her dad while her mom is working
-The second Arc is a flashback to when she explains that she has been having sex with dad since child and that when she reached high school, she asked her dad to stop that already. He agreed, and we move to Arc 3.
-The third Arc is she dealing with the after effects of stopping having sex with her dad. First she masturbated, then she tried dating a guy, she eventually end up having sex with tons of guys, but it was pointless.
-The Final Arc is she not being able to manage her feelings anymore, she tells her dad all what she did after they "break up". He apologizes for not noticing her feelings and end up promising to keep having sex forever, which leads to the First Arc.
